title: Drawing, "View from the East of Mount Chimborazo, Ecuador", June 3, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on green gray paper
markings: Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower center:  Chimborazo  East/ June 3 57 / near San Miguel de Chimbo
description: Horizontal study of Mount Chimborazo shown from the East across ridges and peaks, with clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View from the East of Mount Chimborazo, Ecuador", June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on green gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-205.
